new_thread: Click on the 'What is happening?!' text input area field to initiate a new post thread; data-testid='tweetTextarea_0_label'.
Write the post in the 'What is happening?!' text area input field, make sure it is less than 280 characters.
Click on the 'Post' button to post the new post thread; data-testid='tweetButtonInline'.
comment: Scroll to the comments section, click on the 'Post your reply' text input area field below the Twitter post.
Write the comment in the 'Post your reply' text input area field, make sure it is less than 280 characters.
Click on the 'Reply' button to post the comment.

like: Click on the 'Like' button button below the title.
dislike: Click on the 'I dislike this' button known as the 'Dislike' button.
comment: Click on the title of the video, then scroll to the 'Add a comment...' section, then click on the 'Add a comment...' (ID: contenteditable) text input area to begin write the comment, then click on the 'Comment' button to post the comment.
subscribe: Click on the 'Subscribe' button below the video.

play: To play a song after searching it on spotify, double click on the song in the search result.

search: The default search engine is Google so when you open a new tab or window, you can search directly on Google.
The default search engine is Google so when you open a new tab or window, you can search directly on Google.
The default search engine is Google so when you open a new tab or window, you can search directly on Google.

firefox: To open a new window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + N.
To open a new tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + T.
To open a new private window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + N.
To open a new private tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + T.
To close a tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + W.
To focus on the search bar, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + L.
chrome: To open a new window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + N.
To open a new tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + T.
To open a new private window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + N.
To open a new private tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + T.
To close a tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + W.
To focus on the search bar, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + L.
edge: To open a new window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + N.
To open a new tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + T.
To open a new private window, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + N.
To open a new private tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + T.
To close a tab, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + W.
To focus on the search bar, use the keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + L.
telegram: Press 'esc' to exit the current conversation.
Press 'esc' twice to go to 'All chats'.
